abstract: With NRG Energy suing Exelon and a PepsiCo proposal inspiring a shareholder suit, it was a busy week for deal-related litigation. The Deal Professor has a rundown of these cases and more.
snippet: With NRG Energy suing Exelon and a PepsiCo proposal inspiring a shareholder suit, it was a busy week for deal-related litigation. The Deal Professor has a rundown of these cases and more.
lead_paragraph: While it was a quiet week in the United States deal market again, it was quite a heavy week for news related to deal litigation. I thought I would set forth some of the more significant of these events.
